name: Valari
headline: Embedded finance platform for LatAm.
description:
At Valari, we are on a mission to democratize access to financial services in LatAm, by allowing any company to launch fintech products and services. 

With our simple APIs, tech companies can easily embed a financial product in their platforms.

founders.name: Alejandro Pozo, Founder
founders.description: Alejandro Pozo is the CEO and founder of Valari. He has over 8 years of experience in investments and finance covering LatAm markets from firms like Goldman Sachs and JP Morgan. He founded a small business in LatAm and experienced first-hand the lack of financial services for SMBs in the region.

founders.name: Sebastian Alvarado, Founder
founders.description: Sebastian Alvarado is the CTO and co-founder of Valari. He has over 5 years of experience working on enterprise and high-growth software companies and holds a Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence Specialist from the University of Toronto. More recently, he was part of the founding team at Relay and helped the company from 0 to 12m ARR.

generated_description:
**Valari: Empowering Fintech in Latin America**

Founded in 2021 and located in Mexico City, Valari is on a mission to reshape financial services in Latin America. Initially born out of a passion for democratizing access to fintech products, they rapidly became a key player in the embedded finance space. As part of Y Combinator's Batch W22, Valari has positioned itself as a catalyst for tech companies looking to integrate financial services seamlessly into their platforms using simple APIs.

With just a small team of three, Valari operates under the guidance of Group Partner Tom Blomfield, who brings considerable experience in the fintech realm. They specialize in 'banking-as-a-service', providing solutions that allow any company—from startups to larger institutions—to launch innovative fintech products without the heavy lifting traditionally associated with such endeavors.

The offerings of Valari include a cutting-edge digital banking suite that features solutions such as white-label applications, real-time payments, loan management, and digital onboarding. Their platform, Valinor, supports companies end-to-end to get their embedded finance programs off the ground within weeks, making it a uniquely efficient solution within the industry.

The company's approach not only simplifies complexities in the financial landscape but also ensures that businesses can focus on what matters most: serving their customers with top-notch digital experiences. Through their robust API and developer tools, Valari is poised to lead the charge in creating an accessible financial ecosystem in the region.

For more information or to get involved, check out their website at [valari.co](http://valari.co).
